thread.title: Saeb Erekat: 'I don't aspire to be a president'
thread.title_full: Saeb Erekat: 'I don't aspire to be a president' - Al Jazeera English

author: aljazeera.com
title: Saeb Erekat: 'I don't aspire to be a president'
text:
Palestinian chief negotiator Saeb Erekat says he does not "intend" to be a president.
In July, Erekat was promoted to PLO secretary-general. When pressed by Mehdi Hasan on whether he would never be president of the Palestinian Authority, Erekat responds, "I don't intend, I don't wish, I don't aspire to be a president, I aspire and wish to go back to being a university professor."
Watch the full interview .
Watch UpFront on Al Jazeera English on Fridays at 1930GMT.
Follow UpFront on Twitter @AJUpFront and Facebook.
Source: Al Jazeera
